name: Zombie Smash Drive
description:
Zombie Apocalypse has happened! A strange strain of pox disease was released from the laboratory by a mad scientist.

But don't worry (too much) as you have been prepared for such eventuality. You designed a special anti-zombie bullet proof car with spikes in front of the car.

You have to cross all the country and find a safe place. Can you do it? How far can you go, how many brains can you smash?

Enjoy this unique endless runner free game with a pinch of fun, horror like cartoon 3D graphics.


Features:
- Brainless zombies and monsters on the road
- Jaw-dropping 3D graphics
- Anti-zombie van
- Power-ups such as car fix and extra petrol
- Easy and fun to play, but a challenge to fully master
- Completely Free endless run game
- Don't let zombies to overrun the world. Try to survive!
- Swipe left and right to control the car. Don't crush into barrels filled with petrol
- Awesome pitfalls such as logs and barrels on the road

Have fun with Zombie Smash Drive!
